post.summary: Initiates a conversation between the authenticated user and another user

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to start a conversation with

put.summary: Clears a chat slot by removing a conversation from the active conversations of the authenticated user

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The ID of the channel/conversation to remove

post.summary: Sends a gift as a chat message to another user

requestBody.description: The request containing the destination user ID and asset ID

delete.description: Deletes an interaction between source and destination

get.summary: Get interactions by source
get.description: Gets all interactions for a specific source

get.summary: Get interactions by destination
get.description: Gets all interactions for a specific destination

post.summary: Create an interaction of type block
post.description:
Creates a block interaction. The source ID is automatically extracted from the Bearer token.

Authorization: Bearer token required

delete.description:
Removes a block interaction. The source ID is automatically extracted from the Bearer token.

Authorization: Bearer token required

200.description: UI elements for the specified user

get.summary: Check for bidirectional interaction between two users
get.description: Checks if there's a bidirectional interaction between source and destination, returns the destination user ID if found and whether the value is 0

post.summary: Upsert User Preferences

delete.description: Delete a specific match between two users, only if match_status is MATCHED (1).
